name: Circa 39 Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: new renovated, cool style
reviews.title: we loved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: close to the beaches
reviews.title: Would not recommend!

likes.liked: — The foyer entrance and pool area.
likes.disliked: — The hotel was historic but not nice.

reviews.text: very friendly staff (especially the guy with glasses behind the computer)
reviews.title: good location, tired rooms
Romantic Circa 39
reviews.text: clean, modern rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was not at all what I expected.....and not in a good way! I had never been to South Beach and wanted to stay in the "happening" area in a nice hotel for the one evening I was to be in town. I appreciate historic sites and thought staying at Circa 39 would be a neat way to experience that.
reviews.title: Circa 39 is just OK.

reviews.text: We stayed at the hotel for four days and it was pretty good. We initially didn't have a room as the had overbooked (common in the states in August) and we were eventually, after much debate and arguement, given the junior suite at no additional cost.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.text: This was a pretty decent room with a nice forecourt with hammocks and little outdoor beds.
reviews.title: Shoebox bathrooms

likes.liked: — oh yeah i forgot to add, it was VERY NOISY. walls were paper thin and you can hear the adjoining room activities and hallway noise. couldn't sleep after 7am.

reviews.text: I would suggest spending that little extra and staying closer to south beach (Royal Palm and Loews) although it is not a bad walk (about 2 miles or so).
reviews.title: You get what you pay for

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also be careful as the hotel adds a sneaky $10 charge per person per night charge which can come as a big suprise.
reviews.title: Brilliant Suite

reviews.text: In general, not a bad hotel at all
reviews.title: Nice Enough

likes.disliked: — The rooms could do with a lick of paint

reviews.text: I just came back from 5 nights stay at this property.
reviews.title: Small boutique hotel, too far from the action
Not good at all
reviews.text: The hotel is not that bad in general, the main area is funky, in all-white colour with a nice bar.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However, my room was in a separate building, behind the main hotel, so always had to go via the back street.
reviews.title: enjoyed our stay

reviews.text: The room was ok, two single bed, plasma screen, etc... however they had some refurbishment work going on early mornings so it woke us up....
reviews.title: DON'T GO - HOLIDAY HORROR

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: also, I agree with previous posting, 10$ charge is totally stupid, you get some below average breakfast (toast and juice) for that price.
reviews.title: there are better options

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Circa 39 for 2 days at the beginning of June. The hotel foyer and pool area were lovely but when we were shown our room I was very dissapointed it was very dark and dingy. The washbasin had a crack in it and there was a broken window which had a cover over it. There was no lighting in hallways which made it seem very dark and depressing. I would never stay in this hotel again.
reviews.title: Circa 39 badly needs upgrading

reviews.text: Circa39 exceeded my expectations for the price range. Staff was extremely helpful with all my requests, room was prestine white and very clean, and the pool was very relaxing. I can't wait to go back! Far better than most much more expensive hotels in the area!!
reviews.title: Can't wait to go back!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: To be honest this is the most expensive hostel I have paid for. Hotwire advertises this as 3.5 stars which is definitively no the case.
reviews.title: OK, But its like 2 to 2.5 stars

reviews.text: Dont get me wrong.. This is not an avoid, the hotel is not bad.. Staff was great, location was good, but the hotel is very very basic, rooms very small, parking is not in site, you have to walk to the back rooms from the street, and some things may not work (like our door lock), so, again, not 3.5 stars.
reviews.title: Totally reasonable and pleasant

reviews.text: The 8.00 resort fee is a con. Breakfast is good quality but 100% hostel style, again, very very basic. If you are willing to spend 90 USD plus on something like this, go ahead, but think there are better options for the money....
reviews.title: Cute

description: We invite you to enjoy good vibes, eclectic style, and positive energy at Circa 39 Hotel Miami Beach. Our employees are dedicated to providing a cozy, laid-back retreat for savvy travelers who are looking for smart, affordable vacation options. A home away from home for family and friends, a convenient place to gather, or a quiet escape from the every day.Located just across the street from Miami’s platinum-sand beaches and lucent-blue waters, you’ll enjoy the tranquility of our neighborhood as well as the originality of our décor. Recently updated, all guestrooms are fresh and comfortable embracing the hotel’s beach location featuring hues of crisp white and soothing sea-blue with views of the pool, courtyard or city.
